scripts.prebuild: cd .. && npm run build-back && npm run build-front
scripts.prebundle: mkdirp resources/backend resources/frontend && cp -r ../backend/build resources/backend/ && cp -r ../frontend/build resources/frontend/
scripts.bundle:test: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron electronApp.js
scripts.bundle:osx: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.bundle:linux: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && yarn run build:linux32 && yarn run build:linux64
scripts.bundle:linux32: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron-builder build --linux --ia32
scripts.bundle:linux64: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron-builder build --linux --x64
scripts.bundle:win: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && yarn run build:win32 && yarn run build:win64
scripts.bundle:win32: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron-builder build --win --ia32
scripts.bundle:win64: yarn run clean && yarn run prebuild && yarn run prebundle && electron-builder build --win --x64
